resource.title: Beaverton Seventh-Day Adventist
resource.description: Food boxes.

resource.title: Bethel Congregation United Church of Christ
resource.description: Food pantry for low income Beaverton residents. Register with Care to Share (503) 591-9025.
resource.hours: Hours: 11:30 a.m.-12:30 p.m. Mon., Thurs.; 6:30-7:30 p.m. Wed. Emergency food bags available 9 a.m.-3 p.m. Mon.-Thurs.

resource.title: Care to Share
resource.description: Emergency food boxes for Beaverton residents. Utility assistance provided with shut-off notice. Services for the following zip codes only: 97003, 97005, 97006, 97007, 97008, 97078, 97225, 97229. Tigard zip codes (no utility assistance): 97223. Hillsboro zip codes (no utility asst.): 97123, 97124.
resource.hours: Phone hours: 9 a.m.-2 p.m. Mon.-Fri. Call for appt. Call for energy assistance: 9-9:30 a.m. Mon.

resource.description: Food Pantry.

resource.title: Colton Helping Hands
resource.description: Food Pantry.

resource.title: Columbia Pacific Food Bank
resource.description: Emergency food boxes provide 3-day supply of groceries per month for low-income residents of Vernonia, Timber, Manning and Buxton.

resource.title: Ecumenical Ministries of Oregon Northeast Emergency Food Program
resource.description: Emergency food boxes and clothing. Three times every six months. If no car, bring bag or cart. Lottery system starts at 1 p.m. No geographic boundaries. Provide verification for all members of household. Drive-through pickup Clothing services suspended

resource.title: Estacada Area Food Bank
resource.description: Food Pantry.

resource.description: Pantry open to all households with a student enrolled in the school district. Located at Clackamas River Elementary School.
resource.hours: Hours: 1-4 p.m. Wed. during school year. Summer hours

resource.title: Faith Cafe
resource.description: The St. Mathews Lunch Program will be modified as follow: The meal will be a brown bag to go. Guests may come in to use the restroom facilities but are to pick up their lunch and exit the building.

resource.address: 819 John Adams St. Oregon City, OR 97045

resource.description: Food Pantry.

resource.title: Francis Center
resource.description: Food boxes every 30 days with current mail as proof of address. Boundaries: SE 39th-136th, Clatsop to Powell, Powell to Glisan, 60th-82nd.
resource.hours: Food pantry hours: 10 a.m.-1:45 p.m. Mon.- Thurs. Closed major holidays.

resource.title: Good Roots Community Church
resource.description: Food boxes available for residents needing extra food in 97222 and 97267 zip codes. Hot meal on 3rd Sat. Clothing closet. Hours for food boxes are same. No hot meal or clothing closet.

resource.description: Food Pantry.

resource.title: Lift Urban Portland

resource.description: (First Immanuel Lutheran Church) Emergency food pantry for low-income NW and downtown residents. Available twice per month with proof of residency and four times per month for residents with dependents. Delivered food boxes available with referral. Call for more info Food is pre-packaged

resource.title: Mainspring
resource.description: Weekly food pantry. Bring own bag. Access once weekly. Personal hygiene items upon request and availability.

resource.title: Metro Church of Christ
resource.description: Emergency food boxes. Saturday breakfast is to-go.

resource.description: Food Pantry.

resource.title: Oregon Food Bank
resource.description: Various locations. Provides fruit, vegetables and pantry staples free of charge to anyone in need of food. Some pantries have closed or changed hours. Info is in on website or you can call main OFB number.

resource.title: Oregon City United Methodist Church

resource.title: Portland Adventist Community Services
resource.description: Client Choice Grocery Warehouse provides emergency 3 to 5 days supply of food once a month. Drive through pickup

resource.title: Rock Creek Church Food Pantry
resource.description: Shopping food pantry for those in need. Bring shopping bags, if available.

resource.description: Food boxes for Wash. Co. residents. First visit requires one piece of mail with name and current address. One box every 30 days.
resource.hours: Hours: 1-3 p.m. Mon., Tues., Thurs., Fri.

resource.title: Salvation Army
resource.description: Food boxes once every 30 days for select zip codes. Proof of address required, unless homeless. Call locations for applicable zip codes (entrance on Moore Ave).
resource.hours: Hours: 10 a.m.-noon, 1-4 p.m. Mon., Wed., Fri.

resource.title: Salvation Army
resource.description: Food boxes once every 30 days for select zip codes. Proof of address required, unless homeless. Call locations for applicable zip codes. Must bring reusable bag.
resource.hours: Hours: 9-11:30 a.m., 1-4 p.m. Mon., Wed., Fri.

resource.title: Salvation Army
resource.description: Food boxes once every 30 days for select zip codes. Proof of address required, unless homeless. Call locations for applicable zip codes.

resource.title: Snowcap Comm. Charities
